body.p: A Pennsylvania-born, Kentucky saddler. Married twice, first to Lorindra Crawford Bone Weatherly, and a on a second occasion to Henrietta Weatherly. Father of Mary Weatherly and Isabella Weatherly. Owned two enslaved person in 1850.
